column3: Japan say first test of Raytheon's new SM-3 missile a success WASHINGTON
column4: June 7 The United States and Japan on Sunday announced the first live fire test of Raytheon Co's  new Standard Missile-3 (SM-3) Block IIA missile that is being jointly developed by the two countries for a combined cost of around $2 billion. ~
